amendment.description: Amendment sought to change the effective date of the bill from October 1, 1995 to ten days after enactment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to change the effective date of the bill from October 1, 1995 to ten days after enactment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Collins (IL) amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 250 (Roll no. 73).
